common_issues.title: Pieces OS Connection Issues
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing difficulties connecting to Pieces OS on various ports (1000, 39300). This is impacting integrations and updates. Suggested solutions include verifying port configuration, checking Pieces OS version compatibility, and contacting Pieces support for troubleshooting.

related_issues.title: Getting Error: connect ECONNREFUSED 127.0.0.1:1000
related_issues.text:
Getting Error: connect ECONNREFUSED 127.0.0.1:1000
### Software

Desktop Application, Pieces OS

### Operating System / Platform

Windows

### Your Pieces OS Version

11.0.4

### Early Access Program

- [ ] Yes, this is related to an Early Access Program feature.

### Kindly describe the bug and include as much detail as possible on what you were doing so we can reproduce the bug.

I tried to include the Pieces OS endpoint (127.0.0.1:1000) into my external project, but even though Pieces OS is operating, I keep getting the error "Connection refused."

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/f50f1e1d-4eb2-46a2-9df7-2892ea6d319b)
## GitHub Issue Summary: "POS Port Issue"  

**Key Points:**

* Raju-git20 reported an issue where they're unable to connect to PiecesOS after upgrading to version 11.0.0.
* @mark-at-pieces clarified that a new port 39300 is used with 11.0.0.
* Raju-git20 confirmed trying the new port but still encountered connection issues (provided screenshots).
* @mark-at-pieces explained that POS uses a range of ports, starting with 39300 and checking 100 ports until the port is found.
* Raju-git20 shared that the correct port is shown in the config file and they're building a tool for Linkedin job applications with AI assistance.

**Solutions:**

* Raju-git20 tried the suggested port (39300) but faced issues.
* Raju-git20 expressed interest in scheduling a discussion with Pieces for further support.

**Current Status:**

* Raju-git20's initial problem persists.
* A call is proposed for further troubleshooting and solution finding.

**Overall Outcome:**
Open: The issue remains unresolved, awaiting a technical discussion and collaborative troubleshooting.

*** 
**Disclaimer:** I am only able to access and process information up to November 2023. My responses are based on the information that was available to me at that time. Please be aware that this may not include the most up-to-date information and that external sources like GitHub may contain changes or additional context that was not included in this specific conversation snippet.

common_issues.title: Pieces OS and Desktop App Connection Issues
common_issues.description: Users report connection errors between the Pieces desktop app and Pieces OS on Windows.  Issues include non-dismissable overlay messages, update failures, and connection refusals.  Troubleshooting steps include checking Pieces OS and app versions, verifying port configurations, and reviewing log files.  Solutions involve updating to the latest versions, ensuring proper port access, and contacting support for further assistance.

common_issues.title: Pieces Desktop App Issues on Windows
common_issues.description: Users are experiencing issues with the Pieces desktop app on Windows, including problems with font customization, non-dismissable overlay messages, and difficulties updating Pieces Core Services. Troubleshooting steps include checking for updates, restarting the app or computer, and contacting Pieces support for further assistance.

related_issues.title: How to change the font of the linux app?
related_issues.text:
How to change the font of the linux app? ### Discussed in https://github.com/pieces-app/support/discussions/600
Originally posted by **rafidahmed816** January 27, 2025 The font is too bold. Can I change the font style? ![Screenshot from 2025-01-27 16-30-12](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/fc48f057-36b7-4645-89b8-373702db6fdc)
## GitHub Issue Summary **Issue:** User `rafidahmed816` inquired about changing the font within the Pieces Copilot chats. **Key Points:** * Currently, there is no setting to change the font within Pieces Copilot chats. * The author clarifies that the request is specifically for the chat font, not the Window's title bar font. **Proposed Solutions:** * The author suggests introducing a setting to allow users to change the font within Pieces Copilot chats. **Current Status/Outcome:** * The proposal is being considered and may be added to the roadmap. * No solution has been implemented yet. * The user is informed about the current situation and the possibility of future updates.
